code: import React from'react';import'./ThreatTabs.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ThreatTabs=_ref=>{let{activeTab,onTabChange}=_ref;const tabs=[{id:'alerts',label:'Alerts',icon:'üö®',description:'Security alerts and events'},{id:'iocs',label:'IOCs',icon:'üîç',description:'Indicators of Compromise'},{id:'ttps',label:'TTPs',icon:'üé™',description:'Tactics, Techniques & Procedures'},{id:'campaigns',label:'Campaigns',icon:'üìä',description:'Correlated attack campaigns'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"threat-tabs",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tabs-container",children:tabs.map(tab=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:`tab-button ${activeTab===tab.id?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>onTabChange(tab.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tab-icon",children:tab.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tab-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tab-label",children:tab.label}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tab-description",children:tab.description})]})]},tab.id))})});};export default ThreatTabs;
